meanings.definition: A person who eats the flesh of other human beings.
meanings.sent1: The cannibal in the story was a scary character who ate people.
meanings.sent2: The tribe believed the cannibal was a threat to their safety.
meanings.sent3: The cannibal at the party only wanted to eat the cake, not the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her addiction to gossip made her a cannibal of rumors.
meanings.sent5: The cannibal's appetite for human flesh was insatiable.

meanings.definition: An animal that feeds on members of its own species.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the behavior of the cannibal fish in the aquarium.
meanings.sent2: The documentary showed how the cannibal spider captured and ate its own kind.
meanings.sent3: The cannibal squirrel kept stealing nuts from its fellow squirrels.
meanings.sent4: In the insect world, the cannibal beetle was known for its predatory habits.
meanings.sent5: The cannibalistic behavior of the wolves shocked the nature enthusiasts.
